content.text:
Actually check what files REALLY exist on the filesystem.

Run these commands and report EXACT output:

1. ls -la /root/clawd/
2. ls -la /root/clawd/memory/ 2>/dev/null || echo "memory directory does not exist"
3. ls -la /root/clawd/sports-betting/ 2>/dev/null || echo "sports-betting directory does not exist"
4. cat /root/clawd/HEARTBEAT.md 2>/dev/null || echo "HEARTBEAT.md does not exist"

Be HONEST about what actually exists. Don't guess, just report the exact command outputs.
